ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle chilled mild red wine (such as Lambrusco)
des: "I love berries and put as many as I can in this easy and refreshing summer sangria!"
ins: Mix wine, apple, strawberries, raspberries, cherries, blueberries, blackberries, and brandy together in a pitcher; refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Stir lemon-lime soda into wine mixture.
